name: muff
content:
Add to word list

a short tube of fur or warm cloth, used by women in the past to keep their hands warm in cold weather

to spoil an opportunity or do something badly: I only had two lines in the whole play and I muffed them. Synonyms
botch
mess (something) up informalCompare
fluff verb mainly UK informal

to fail to catch a ball, or do something badly: She muffed her lines in her first stage appearance.
